title: The One Where Lala Drinks Apple Cider Vinegar Water
description:
Look out, world! Lala left her house over the weekend, and shares details on the wine tour / birthday party she attended, and what it was like to do sober. Lala also talks sobriety and animal activism, and answers your voicemails about the Gusbands, eating vegan, living in the moment, anxiety and depression, and having fun without a cocktail (or a shot) in hand!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
